section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before proceeding with the installation.

section.title: Hardware Requirements
section.para: For optimal performance, the Resource Adaptor requires sufficient RAM memory and Java Heap size. For instance, while the underlying &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE may run with 1GB of RAM, 8GB is needed to achieve performance higher than 800 new requests per second.
There is no minimum CPU specification. However, a fast CPU can greatly contribute to the overall performance of your setup as more requests can be processed per second.

section.title: Software Prerequisites
section.para: The RA requires &THIS.PLATFORM; that the JAIN SLEE is correctly set and that Mobicents Diameter Multiplexer (MUX), which includes the stack, is correctly installed.

section.title: Uninstalling &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
section.para: To uninstall the Resource Adaptor, execute the provided ant script build.xml undeploy target:
The script will delete the RA deployable unit jar from the default &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE server profile deploy directory. To undeploy from another server profile, use the argument -Dnode=.
